ingredients.ingredient: 4 pieces frozen, breaded pre-cooked chicken strips
1 (14 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained

cookingTips: Fry pre-cooked chicken strips briefly just to heat through and re-crisp the coating
Layer mashed potatoes first as the base for structural support
Top with warm cheese and corn so they meld together with the warm chicken
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is an assembly dish. How can you ensure all components are warm and flavors complement?
